description.translate: What took them out of their master's foot is a mystery... or a tragedy.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§5Bottes du prince\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Ce qui les a retirés du pied de leur\"}","{\"text\":\"§7maître est un mystère... ou une tragédie.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7What took them out of their master's foot\"}","{\"text\":\"§7is a mystery... or a tragedy.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7HAS§a1 §7DAR§a3 §7LUC§c-1\"}"],color:3983}}
